meta.title: About Us - RLS ANALYZ | Corporate Real Estate in West Africa
meta.description: RLS ANALYZ is a corporate real estate advisory firm combining financial excellence, analytical rigor, and African expertise to turn data into strategic value.

hero.title: About RLS ANALYZ
hero.subtitle: Financial expertise and real estate serving real value

identity.title: Our Identity: A Trusted Partner
identity.p1: RLS ANALYZ is a firm specialized in **corporate real estate**, founded to support market players across West Africa. Based in Côte d’Ivoire, we position ourselves as a strategic partner for banks, investors, developers, real estate companies, and public institutions.
identity.p2: Our technical, financial, and strategic expertise relies on a unique approach combining **analytical rigor**, mastery of international standards **(RICS & IVS)**, and an in-depth understanding of the local context.
identity.p3: This dual competence — **international and local** — allows us to deliver tailored analyses that meet institutional requirements while addressing the operational realities of the West African real estate market.

mission.title: Our Mission: Turning Data into Strategic Value
mission.description: RLS ANALYZ’s mission is to transform real estate data into strategic value. In an environment where decisions must rely on accurate and documented analysis, we provide clients with the tools and expertise to maximize the performance of their investments.

p1.title: Assess Profitability
p1.description: We thoroughly analyze the financial viability of your real estate projects, identifying key performance indicators and value-creation levers.

p2.title: Optimize Decisions
p2.description: Our financial models help guide your investment, financing, and development choices with comparative scenarios and sensitivity analyses.

p3.title: Secure Operations
p3.description: We apply international best practices to ensure the compliance and robustness of your financial and operational structures.

values.title: Our Added Value: Four Pillars of Excellence
values.subtitle: RLS ANALYZ stands out through a technical, strategic, and digital approach. Our unique positioning in the West African market is built on four fundamental pillars ensuring the quality and relevance of our analyses.

financial.title: Financial Expertise
financial.description: Mastery of modeling tools and internationally recognized valuation methods.

regulatory.title: Regulatory Approach
regulatory.description: Integration of the OHADA legal framework and the Ivorian Construction and Housing Code into our analyses.

innovation.title: Technological Innovation
innovation.description: Development of in-house tools like the MODELI add-in, an Excel module for automated asset modeling.

african.title: African Footprint
african.description: Deep knowledge of the land, fiscal, and institutional realities across the UMOA region.

vision.title: Our Vision: Regional Leadership
vision.quote: RLS ANALYZ aims to become the leading reference in institutional real estate modeling and valuation in West Africa.
vision.description: We actively contribute to transforming the regional real estate market toward greater transparency, professionalism, and bankability.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Standardizing valuation and reporting practices according to international norms.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.description: Raising analytical and modeling standards across the regional market.

bankability.title: Bankability
bankability.description: Structuring projects that meet institutional investors’ requirements.

stats.title: Why Choose RLS ANALYZ?
stats.description: In a transforming real estate market, RLS ANALYZ is the ideal partner to secure your investments and optimize your asset performance.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Real Estate Projects?
cta.subtitle: Whether you’re an institutional investor, developer, public institution, or bank, RLS ANALYZ supports you with expert analysis and evaluation tailored to your needs.

testimonials.title: They Trust Us
testimonials.subtitle: Discover testimonials from our satisfied clients

first.text: MODELI supported us in our establishment in Paris. Their market study allowed us to choose the best location for our business. A true trusted partner.

second.text: The sector analysis carried out by MODELI was decisive in our expansion strategy. Their expertise and responsiveness are exceptional.

third.text: Thanks to MODELI, we optimized our real estate investment. Their personalized advice and rigorous monitoring allowed us to maximize our profitability.

meta.title: Privacy Policy | MODELI
meta.description: Learn how MODELI collects, uses and protects your personal data in accordance with GDPR.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy matters to us. Learn how we protect your data.
privacy.intro: MODELI (hereinafter 'we', 'our' or 'us') is committed to protecting the confidentiality of your personal data. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, share and protect your personal information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

section1.title: Data Collected
section1.intro: We collect different types of personal data when you use our services:

identity.title: Identity data
identity.description: First name, last name, postal address

navigation.title: Navigation data
navigation.description: Pages visited, visit duration, actions performed

technical.title: Technical data
technical.description: IP address, browser type, operating system

section2.title: Data Usage
section2.intro: Your personal data is used to:

items.respond: Respond to your contact and information requests
items.improve: Improve our services and your user experience
items.inform: Inform you of our news and offers (with your consent)
items.analyze: Analyze the use of our website
items.comply: Comply with our legal and regulatory obligations

section3.title: Data Sharing
section3.intro: We never sell your personal data. We may share your information only with:

items.legal: Legal authorities if required by law
items.consent: Any other party with your explicit consent

section4.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
section4.intro: We use cookies to improve your experience on our site:

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: To understand how you use our site and improve it

section5.title: Your Rights
section5.intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the following rights:

access.title: Right of access
access.description: Obtain a copy of your personal data

rectification.title: Right of rectification
rectification.description: Correct your inaccurate or incomplete data

portability.title: Right to portability
portability.description: Receive your data in a structured format

opposition.title: Right to object
opposition.description: Object to the processing of your data

limitation.title: Right to restriction
limitation.description: Restrict the processing of your data

section6.title: Data Security
section6.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, loss, destruction or alteration. This includes encryption of sensitive data, restricted data access, and regular security audits.

section7.title: Data Retention
section7.content: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected, or in accordance with applicable legal obligations. Contact data is generally retained for 3 years after your last contact with us.

section8.title: Changes to this Policy
section8.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal or regulatory reasons. We encourage you to regularly review this page to stay informed about our data protection practices.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.intro: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or to exercise your rights, contact us:
